title: Star Essence
text: Star Essence is the power of the cosmos. It combines the heat of Fire with the purity of Light and the distance of the Void. It is incredibly potent but difficult to control, as it seeks to burn everything it touches. Star Mages are rare, often identifiable by the constellations that appear on their skin when they cast.
image_prompt: A glowing white star in a hand, casting long shadows, cosmic background.
